title: Abigail Dare
description: The need to go home is as unyielding as steel, more important to the human spirit than flesh and bone, more powerful than life itself. If you think you know how this story ends, you're wrong. Engrossing, heartbreaking, and just creepy enough to keep you up at night, Abigail Dare is not your ordinary ghost story.
author: Jon Etheredge
